name: Stop/Start UFW firewall systemctl
description: Stop the Uncomplicated Firewall (UFW) if installed, using systemctl.

data.command:
systemctl start ufw
systemctl status ufw

steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Check if systemctl and ufw is installed on the machine.

data.command:
if [ ! -x "$(command -v systemctl)" ]; then echo -e "
***** systemctl NOT installed *****
"; exit 1; fi
if [ ! -x "$(command -v ufw)" ]; then echo -e "
***** ufw NOT installed *****
"; exit 1; fi
if echo "$(ufw status)" |grep -q "inactive"; then echo -e "
***** ufw inactive *****
"; exit 1; fi

steps.description: Check if systemctl and ufw is installed on the machine.
